bibl.title: Conquest and Literacy: The Case of Ptolemaic Egypt.
bibl.note: The changes from Egyptian to Greek took place at different rates for different levels of the society in different regions of the country.
THOMPSON Dorothy J., Conquest and Literacy: The Case of Ptolemaic Egypt.
Deborah KELLER-COHEN (Ed.), Literacy: Interdisciplinary Conversations = Written Language Series (Cresskill, New Jersey, 1994) pp. 71-89; - 85-86.
